text:
[Verse]
Splashing in the puddles
Feel the water rise
Laughing with the thunder
Under cloudy skies

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
We're never feeling pain
Joy in every drop
This love will never stop

[Verse 2]
Wind is in our hair
Music everywhere
Spinning like a wheel
In this dreamy air

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
We're never feeling pain
Joy in every drop
This love will never stop

[Bridge]
Echoes in the night
Our world is pure delight
Hearts shining so bright
In the silver light

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
We're never feeling pain
Joy in every drop
This love will never stop
title: Dancing in the Rain
